column5: A group of us are heading up to Canada and 2 in the group are bear hunting, My Son has an outdoor card and hunted there back in 2013 now my brother on the other hand says he throws out all his old licenses. Anyone ever bought a license with just a hunter safety certificate if we can track that down ?
The first time we went up deer hunting we took our current hunting licenses from Wisconsin and that worked fine.
Thanks Joe, Never thought of that I'll just tell him to get a small game or something in Virginia.
The license must be from the state in which you reside.
